sentences.sentence: One hope will raise our sprits.
sentences.translation: 一个希望可以鼓舞斗志。

sentences.sentence: Good oral communication and team sprits are preferred.
sentences.translation: 良好的沟通能力及团队协作能力者优先。

sentences.sentence: They spent too much sprits on bringing up their children.
sentences.translation: 他在教育孩子方面花了大量的心血。
